message: Professor Kevin Chang's research interests include search, integration, and mining of data, as well as entity-centric Web search/mining and social media analytics. He has received awards for his research, and co-founded a startup from the University of Illinois, Cazoodle, for deepening vertical "data-aware" search over the web. His research also includes information extraction, vertical search products, event detection, user profiling, data-aware search, large-scale mining and integration. Do you have any other questions about Professor Kevin Chang?
speaker: USER
